text: E aghumsɨzir arazir gumaziba mogava amiba, e akɨrim ragha dagh asara. E ifavarir arazibagh amir puvatɨ. Egha e Godɨn akam girazɨ, a igharagha otozir puvatɨ. E Godɨn guizɨn akam azenarama anekuri, eghtɨ gumazamiziba bar uan navir averiabar aven en araziba tuisɨgham. Egh me kamaghɨn fogham, e ingangarir bar aghuim Godɨn damazimɨn a gami.
